languages.text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Противники, на которых действует {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, наложенные псайкером, получают на 10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that are under blinded, stunned, immobilised, or prone effects applied by the Psyker, suffer +20% more damage.
Enemies, currently inflicted with blinded, stunned, immobilised, or prone effects by the pysker, suffer +20% more damage.
Enemies, currently inflicted with blinded, stunned, immobilised, or prone effects by the pysker, suffer +20% more damage.

Enemies, currently inflicted with {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects by the pysker, suffer +10% more damage.

Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Противники, на которых действует {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, наложенные псайкером, получают на 10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Противники, на которых действует ослепление, оглушение, обездвиживание или опрокидывание, наложенные псайкером, получают на 20% больше урона.
Противники, на которых действует ослепление, оглушение, обездвиживание или опрокидывание, наложенные псайкером, получают на 20% больше урона.

languages.text: 所有被灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，或施加{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}效果的敌人，受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%。
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有当前被灵能者致盲、眩晕、定身，或施加俯卧效果的敌人，受到的全部伤害提高20%。

languages.text: Los enemigos que hayan sufrido {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegados{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} a manos del psíquico sufren un +10 % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que hayan sido cegados, aturdidos, inmovilizados o derribados por el psíquico sufren un +20 % más de daño.

languages.text: Feinde, die durch Effekte des Psionikers momentan {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} sind, erleiden +10 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die durch den Psioniker momentan geblendet, betäubt, gelähmt oder hingestreckt sind, erleiden +20 % mehr Schaden.

languages.text: Les ennemis auxquels le psyker inflige actuellement les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} subissent 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis auxquels le psyker inflige actuellement les effets Aveuglement, Étourdissement ou Immobilisation subissent +20 % de dégâts supplémentaires.

languages.text: この異能者から{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}の効果を受けている敵は、被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+10%増加する。
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この異能者から{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}の効果を受けている敵は、被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+10%増加する。

languages.text: Ruhsezerin sebep olduğu {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} etkilerinden muzdarip olan düşmanlar +%10 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar.
languages.original_text: Enemies suffering from the {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} effects inflicted by the psyker suffer +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
